Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their chance to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Torrent.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback
Torrent.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Torrent.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: You are being held by the Petrifying Gaze.
Petrifying_Gaze.display_attacker_hit: Your {Powername} Immobilizes {PlayerDest} and reduces his defense.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. You must be level 41 and have Torrent or Petrifying Gaze before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. You must be level 41 and have Torrent or Petrifying Gaze before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your chance to hit.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. You must be level 44 and have two other Darkness Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you in place and reducing your Accuracy.
